text: geuneun hananim-ui bunmyeonghan malsseum-eul nangsonghal han seonjijalo mid-eum-eulo seon-eul haenghaneun jaleul amheug-eseo gwangmyeong eulo indohalila hananim-eul midgo seon-eul haenghaneun ja hananim-eun geulo hayeo gangmul-i heuleuneun cheongug-eulo deulge hayeo geugos-eseo yeongsaengke halila ha nanim-eun geuleul wihae gajang hullyunghan bosang-eul bepusinola
